actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

official_title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that any comprehensive health care reform measure should ensure that extemporaneous compounding is made available to provide allergen-free medications for persons who suffer from severe food allergies or other medical conditions.

summary.text: Declares that it is the sense of the Congress that comprehensive health care reform should make contemporaneous compounding available to provide allergen-free medications.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that any comprehensive health care reform measure should ensure that extemporaneous compounding is made available to provide allergen-free medications for persons who suffer from severe food allergies or other medical conditions.
